comments: Mrs. Rabbit is an outstanding teacher. I was very nervous about taking this class as math is not my strong suit. She made things make sense and was available to help at any time I had questions. If youdo your homework you will pass this class.

The method of instruction used by Melody Rabbitt, allow her students to replace their fear of math, with a level of confidence that becomes their driving force to succeed. Melody Rabbitt seems to have a gift for taking this intimidating information, and creating a flow of understanding that needs no more than one introduction.

Great teacher! She\'s a teach by example math teacher. She\'ll do problems on the board and take questions until you understand it. Very open to questions and never ever ever out to make a student feel stupid. I highly recommend her.

She is a wonderful teacher. If you have a hard time with algebra shes the teacher for you. she goes over everything, plus gives out tons of homework points, so if you dont get one lesson you\'ll still pass. I highly recommend this teacher.
Great teacher. One of the best I have had. Treats her students a little bit like highschoolers, but some times they act like it. If you get the chance take her classes.

Mrs Rabbitt is a great math teacher, lectures well and is always willing to help. 100% BETTER than any math teacher i\'ve had so far at TCC. She teaches only through the book, not coursecompass... way better!! does give homework daily but i\'m in a 8 week class. if you aren\'t great in math like myself, she is the perfect teacher.
